type: Lease and rental of property or building
short_summary: INVITATION TO SUBMIT AN EXPRESSION OF INTEREST (EOI) - Space for Lease
description: See attached document for more information.
full_summary:
===============

### Title and Bilingual References

* Title (English): Notice of Invitation to Express Interest in Leasing Space for Public Services and Procurement Canada
* Title (French): Avis d'invitation à soumettre UNE expression d'intérêt dans le contexte d'une location d'espace pour Services publics et Approvisionnement Canada (SPAC)
* Reference Number: cb-6871-78873751

### Description

(Issued by Services publics et Approvisionnement Canada (SPAC) invites all interested parties to submit information regarding the potential lease of office space to accommodate the following requirements)


### Lease Requirements

The required Lease is for approximately 15 years (2025-2039, with options to extend for three additional 1-year periods), consisting of:

* 1386 usable square meters (contiguous office space) with 11 parking spaces
* Must be available 26 weeks prior to the lease commencement date (October 1st, 2025)
* Must be on the ground floor or single-story building with private access
* Must permit environmental sustainability, loading facilities, and contiguous floors
* Must not be industrial or residential in nature


### Eligibility

* Must be in Quebec City or within the specified geographic boundaries (Avenue Chauveau, Boulevard Lebourgneuf, Autoroute Robert Bourassa, Autoroute Laurentienne, Autoroute Henri IV)
* Must comply with SPAC's Standards for Leased Accommodation

### Response and Evaluation

* Responses to be in writing to SPAC ( Attention: Robert Demers, 1550 D'Estimauville Avenue, 6th floor, Québec, QC G1J 0C7)
* Deadline for responses is July 21, 2023

### Security Clearance

* Les propriétaires des locaux proposés devront obtenir une attestation de sécurité valide de niveau « Fiabilité » approuvée et délivrée par la Direction de la sécurité industrielle canadienne (DSIC) de SPAC avant le début des travaux d'aménagement.


### Contact and Information

For more information, please contact Robert Demers, Senior Leasing Officer, at (418) 997-2876 or robert.demers@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

Note that this is not a tender process, nor a request for proposal, but only an inquiry into the availability of suitable space for leasing to meet the requirements of SPAC. 

Ann
